"Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health. 

CAST RANGE: 575 
SELF DAMAGE: 110/160/210/260 
DAMAGE/HEAL: 120/165/210/255"

"Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast. 

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel 
DURATION: 15secs 
MAX DAMAGE ASORBER: 110/140/170/200 
BURST RADIUS: 675"

"Abaddon strikes an enemy, slowing the target's movement speed. If the target gets hit 4 times, they become affected by a chilling curse causing them to be silenced and slowed, and all attacks against them gain an attack speed boost. 

BASIC DURATION: 5 
BASIC SLOW: 10%/15%/20%/25% 

CURSE DURATION: 4.5 
CURSE SLOW: 15%/30%/45%/60% 
CURSE ATTACK SPEED: 40/60/80/100"

"When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below 400. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter. 

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel 
HEALTH THRESHOLD: 400 
DURATION: 4/5/6"

"Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, anytime an ally takes more than 525 damage while within 1600 range of Abaddon, an individual Mist Coil will automatically fire towards that ally. 

SCEPTER DURATION: 7/8/9 
SCEPTER DAMAGE THRESHOLD: 525 
SCEPTER RANGE: 1600"
"APHOTIC SHIELD - UPGRADE \n\nCauses Mist Coil and Aphotic Shield to apply a Curse of Avernus stack on enemies. Increases base slow by 10%."
Melee - Carry - Support - Durable - Disabler - Initiator - Nuker
"ABILITY: Point Target \nDAMAGE TYPE: Physical \nPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No"

"ABILITY: Unit Target 
DAMAGE TYPE: Physical 
DISPELLABLE: Strong Dispells Only 
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No "

"Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced. 

RADIUS: 475/525/575/625 
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 20/25/30/35 
ARMOUR REDUCTION: 4/5/6/7 
DURATION: 16"

"Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown. 

MAX STUN: 1.75/2.5/3.25/4 
MAX DAMAGE: 150/220/290/360 
EXPLOSION RADIUS: 250"

"Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next 30 seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield more gold. 

RECENT KILL WINDOW: 36 
BASE BONUS GOLD: 3 
EXTRA BONUS GOLD: 3 
MAX BONUS GOLD PER KILL: 15/18/21/24 
BOUNTY RUNE MULTIPLIER: 1.5/2/2.5/3"

"Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and health regeneration. Applies a basic dispel on cast. 

HEALTH REGEN BONUS: 50/75/100 
MOVE SPEED BONUS: 40/50/60 
BASE ATTACK TIME: 1.2/1.1/1 
DURATION: 25"

"Alchemist melts down Aghanim's Scepter to grant an allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades. If an ally already has a scepter buff or the item, it refunds them based on which version they have. When you have a Scepter of your own, you will gain bonus damage and spell amplification for each gifted Scepter. 

SCEPTER BONUS DAMAGE: 20 
SCEPTER SPELL AMP: 5%"

"BERSERK POTION - NEW ABILITY \n\nGrants Berserk Potion. Throws a potion at the target ally, applying a basic dispel and granting +50 Attack Speed, +30 Movement Speed and +40 HP Regen for 10 seconds. Cast Range: 800. Cooldown: 35. Manacost: 125. Can be used on self."

"Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration. 

RADIUS: 300 
BONUS ARMOUR: 30 
DURATION: 2/2.4/2.8/3.2"

"Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger, half speed from creeps. 

DURATION: 12 
MOVEMENT SLOW: 12% 
SPEED BONUS: 12% 
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 16/24/32/40"

"When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies. 

RADIUS: 275 
CHANCE TO HELIX: 17%/18%/19%/20% 
DAMAGE: 60/100/140/180"

"Axe spots a weakness and strikes, instantly killing an enemy unit with low health, or dealing moderate damage otherwise. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed. 

KILL THRESHOLD: 250/350/450 
DAMAGE: 150/250/300 
KILL MOVE SPEED BONUS: 30% 
KILL ATTACK SPEED BONUS: 30 
KILL SPEED DURATION: 6 
KILL SPEED RADIUS: 900"

"SCEPTER UPGRADE: Berserker's Call applies Battle Hunger to affected unit 6s. Battle Hunger also reduces enemy armor by 7 and grants you 7 per affected target (half on creeps). Lowers Berserker's Call cooldown by 3 seconds."
"COUNTER HELIX - UPGRADE \n\nCauses Counter Helix to apply a 6s stacking debuff that reduces attack damage by 20% and increases Counter Helix chance by 10%"
"+2.5% Wild Axes Damage Amp Per Stack"

"Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path. Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units. 

CAST RANGE:1500 
DAMAGE PER AXE: 40/70/100/130 
DAMAGE AMP PER AXE: 6%/8%/10%/12%"

"Beastmaster calls forth a boar to aid in the battlefield. 

SUMMON DURATION: 60 
BOAR HEALTH: 300/450/600/750 
BOAR ATTACK DAMAGE: 20/35/50/65 
BOAR SLOW: 10%/20%/30%/40% 
BOAR POISON DURATION: 3"

"Beastmaster sends an invisible hawk to scout an area. 

SUMMON DURATION: 60 
HAWK HEALTH: 150/200/250/300 
HAWK SPEED: 300/340/380/420 
HAWK VISION: 750/800/850/900"

"Untaps the inner fury of allies, passively increasing their attack speed. 

RADIUS: 1200 
BONUS ATTACK SPEED: 15/25/35/45"

"Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open, a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed. Additionally, Beastmaster and his units gain bonus movement speed. 

STUN DURATION: 3/3.5/4 
DAMAGE: 150/225/300 
SHOUT WIDTH: 300 
MVOEMENT SLOW: 60% 
ATTACK SLOW: 60 
SLOW DURATION: 3/3.5/4 
SELF BONBUS SPEED: 40% 
SPEED DURATION: 3/3.5/4"
"Causes Wild Axes to have no cooldown, and can be used again once they come back. \n\nSCEPTER COOLDOWN: 0"

"CALL OF THE WILD HAWK - UPGRADE 

Hawks gain a new ability - Dive Bomb. Channels for 1 second, revealing itself, and then flies towards the target enemy, dealing 250 damage and stunning them for 2 second, killing the hawk. Cast Range: 1200. 
Also lowers cooldown by 15."

"Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy land units. 

RADIUS: 400 
DAMAGE:90/160/230/300 
MOVEMENT SLOW: 25%/35%/45%/55% 
ATTACK SLOW: 25/35/45/55 \SLOW DURATION: 4"

"Drenches an area in alcohol, causing enemy units to move slower and ignited once they take any spell damage. Duration is increased by 3 seconds when ignited. 
DURATION: 5 
IGNITE TOTAL DAMAGE: 75/150/225/300 
MOVEMENT SLOW: 24%/28%/32%/36%"

"Brewmaster passively gains a chance to evade physical attacks and deal critical damage when attacking. When activated, Brewmaster goes into a drunken brawler state, granting him increased chance to evade or deal critical damage. Brewmaster moves with a varying amount of movement speed, alternating between 20% slower and 40% faster. 

PASSIVE EVASION: 15%/20%/25%/30% 
PASSIVE CRIT CHANCE: 24% 
CRIT DAMAGE: 145%/160%/175%/190% 
ACTIVE EVASION AND CRIT MULTIPLIER: 3 
DURATION: 5"

"Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter. \n\nDURATION: 16/18/20"
"Primal Split has 2 charges and can be canceled at any time. Your hero forms back on whichever brewling you canceled it from. Charge replenish time is equal to the normal cooldown."
"PRIMAL SPLIT - UPGRADE \n\nPrimal Split now creates a Void brewling. Has Astral Pulse ability, affecting enemies in 500 AoE. Applies a 20%/30%/40% slow and Disarm for 2.5 seconds. Cooldown: 20."

"Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback. Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14 seconds. 

RADIUS: 700 
QUILL BASE DAMAGE: 25/45/65/85 
QUILL STACK DAMAGE: 28/30/32/34 n\MAX DAMAGE: 550

"Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear. If Bristleback takes 210 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level. 

SIDE DAMAGE REDUCTION: 8%/12%/16%/20% 
BACK DAMAGE REDUCTION: 16%/24%/32%/40% 
DAMAGE THRESHOLD: 210"

"Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage. 

DAMAGE PER STACK: 25/30/35 
MOVEMENT PER STACK: 3%/4%/5%

MAX STACKS: 5/7/9"

"SCEPTER UPGRADE: Viscous Nasal Goo becomes a no target area of effect ability, applying to all enemies within range. 

SCEPTER RADIUS: 800 
STACK LIMIT: 7"

"HAIRBALL - NEW ABILITY \n\nGrants Hairball. Coughs a quill filled hairball towards the target location. Erupts at the location, hitting enemies in a 700 radius with Goo and two Quills. Cast Range: 1500. Cooldown: 20. Manacost: 100."

DAMAGE: 120/180/240/300

"Centaur counters all attacks, dealing damage back to the attacker. Returns a fixed amount plus a percentage based on your strength. Deals half damage to towers. 

RETURN DAMAGE: 15/30/45/60 
STR RETURN DAMAGE: 20%/26%/32%/38%"

"Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and stop any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter. 

STAMPEDE DURATION: 3.5/4/4.5 
STRENGTH MULTIPLIER DAMAGE: 1.75/2.5/3.25 
SLOW DURATION: 2.5 
TRAMPLE RADIUS: 105 
SCEPTER DAMAGE REDUCTION: 40%"
"SCEPTER UPGRADE: Heroes affected by Stampede take reduced damage, and are able to run through obstructions, including trees and up cliffs. Increases duration by 1s. \nDAMAGE REDUCTION: 40%"
"DOUBLE EDGE - UPGRADE \n\nCauses Double Edge to increase your strength by 15% per hero hit for 15 seconds. Duration refreshes per stack, up to 5 stacks. Slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds."

"Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.

MINIMUM DAMAGE: 90/110/130/150 
MAXIMUM DAMAGE: 180/220/260/300"

"Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a point along the line between the two of you. Reduces armor of the enemy unit for 6 seconds. 

CAST RANGE: 550/600/650/700 
PULL DISTANCE: 250/300/350/400 
ARMOUR REDUCTION: 4/5/6/7 
DURATION: 6"

"Chaos Knight's attacks have a chance to deal a critical strike of varying strength, in addition to a lifesteal for a percentage of the damage. 

MIN CRITICAL DAMAGE: 120% 
MAX CRITICAL DAMAGE: 140%/175%/210%/245% 
CRITICAL LIFESTEAL: 24%/36%/48%/60% 
CHANCE: 33.3%"

"Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. The phantasms are strong illusions that deal 100% damage, but take 325% damage. Upgradeable by Aghanim's Scepter. 

NUMBER OF PHANTASMS: 1/2/3 
 PHANTASM DURATION: 30 
PHANTASM DAMAGE: 100% 
PHANTASM DAMAGE TAKEN: 325%"
"SCEPTER UPGRADE: Creates an illusion of allied heroes. Creates an additional illusion for Chaos Knight as well."
"CHAOS BOLT - UPGRADE \n\nChaos Bolt creates a Phantasm illusion attacking the target for 6s. Increases cast range by 300."

"Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near. Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down. Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one. 

DAMAGE: 50/125/200/275 
MANA/HEALTH DRAIN: 50/80/110/140 
ATTACKS REQUIRED: 2 
DURATION: 5/6/7/8"

"Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 8 seconds. 

DAMAGE: 80/120/160/200 
RADIUS: 600 
VISION DURATION: 8"

"Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location. If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage. Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter. 

STUN DURATION: 1.5/1.75/2 
RANGE: 2000/2500/3000 
DAMAGE: 75/175/275"

"SCEPTER UPGRADE: Grants new ability: Overclocking. \nResets Clockwerk's ability cooldowns and grants him bonus movement and attack speed for a duration. Clockwerk becomes stunned after the duration runs out."

"JETPACK - NEW ABILITY \n\nGrants Jet Pack. Rises up and grants flying vision, flying movement and 20% movement speed, but significantly reduced ability to turn. Lasts 6 seconds. You are disarmed during the flight. Casting Hookshot ends this buff. Cooldown: 16. Manacost: 75."

"Dawnbreaker whirls her hammer around 3 times, damaging enemies with her attack plus bonus damage. On the final strike, she smashes her hammer down, stunning and damaging enemies in front of her. 

COMBO DURATION: 1.1 
SWIPE RADUIS: 360 
SWIPE BONUS DAMAGE: 25/35/45/55 
SMASH RADIUS: 250 
SMASH BONUS DAMAGE: 40/65/90/115 
SMASH STUN DURATION: 0.8/1/1.2/1.4"

"Dawnbreaker hurls her weapon at a target, damaging enemies struck along the way. The hammer pauses for 2 seconds at the destination before flying back to her, leaving a trail of fire that slows enemies. Dawnbreaker can recall the hammer at any time, pulling her towards it so they meet in the middle. 

HAMMER DAMAGE: 60/90/120/150 
FIRE TRAIL DURATION: 2.5 
FIRE TRAIL RADIUS: 150 
FIRE TRAIL MOVEMENT SLOW: 35% 
FIRE TRAIL BURN DPS: 20/30/40/50 
CAST RANGE: 1000/1100/1200/1300"

"After 4 attacks, Dawnbreaker powers up, charging her next attack with a critical hit that heals all allied heroes within 650 units around her for a portion of attack damage dealt. Creeps and neutral enemies provide less healing. Allies are healed for 35% of the amount. 

HEALING FROM HEROES: 30%/40%/50%/60% 
CRITICAL STRIKE DAMAGE: 120%/140%/160%180% 
CREEP HEAL PENALTY: 50%"

"Dawnbreaker creates a pulsing effect at a location within 500 units of an allied hero anywhere on the map, damaging enemies and healing allies with each pulse. After a short duration, she flies to the target location, dealing additional damage and stunning enemies upon landing. Once channeled, Dawnbreaker cannot stop the ability. 

LAND RADIUS: 500 
DAMAGE PER PULSE: 30/50/70 
HEAL PER PULSE: 45/70/95 
LANDING DAMAGE: 130/160/190 
LANDING STUN DURATION: 1.5/1.75/2"

"SCEPTER UPGRADE: Reduces Solar Guardian Channeling time to 1s. Solar Guardian can be cast again upon takeoff to land early. Solar Guardian now gives allies in the area +60% evasion while Dawnbreaker is airborne, increases Heal Per Pulse from 45/70/95 to 60/90/120 and total airborne time by 3.5 seconds"

"Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers. LEVEL 1 Green Dragon - Corrosive Breath: attacks deal 20 poison damage per second for 5 seconds. Works on structures. LEVEL 2 Red Dragon - Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a 350 radius, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets. LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon - Frost Breath: slows movement speed by 40% and attack speed by 40 of enemy units in Splash Attack range for 3 seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets. 

DURATION: 60 
BONUS MOVE SPEED: 25 
BONUS ATTACK RANGE: 350"

"Earth Spirit smashes the target enemy or ally, sending them in the direction he is facing. If Earth Spirit targets an area, he will smash the nearest Stone Remnant in a 200 radius. The travelling unit or Remnant damages all enemy units it hits. If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also slowed. Stone Remnants travel further than other units. 

REMNANT SMASH RADIUS: 180 
DAMAGE: 105/170/235/300 
SLOW: 50% 
SLOW DURATION: 1.25/2.5/3.25/4 
TRAVEL SPEED: 900 
DISTANCE: 480/600/680/800 
DISTANCE(REMNANT): 2000"

"Earth Spirit gathers himself into a boulder and, after a 0.6s delay, rolls toward the target location, damaging enemy units and stunning them. He will stop if he collides with an enemy hero or is stunned. If he rolls over a Stone Remnant, he will travel further and faster, and enemies hit by the boulder will be stunned for an extra duration. 

SPEED: 800 
SPEED(REMNANT): 1600 
DISTANCE: 750 
DISTANCE(REMNANT): 1500 
DAMAGE: 70/90/110/130 
STUN DURATION: 0.4/0.6/0.8/1 
ROCK STUN DURATION: 0.8/1.2/1.6/2"

"Earth Spirit pulls the target Stone Remnant. Enemies struck by the gripped target will be silenced, and take damage if the gripped target is a Stone Remnant. 

SILENCE DURATION: 2/2.5/3/3.5 
HERO PULL SPEED: 600 
REMANT DAMAGE: 50/100/150/200 
REMANT PULL SPEED: 900"

"Call a Stone Remnant to the target location. Stones Remnants are invulnerable, and can be used with Earth Spirit's abilities. Calling a Stone Remnant consumes a charge, which recharge over time. 

MAX CHARGES: 7 
CHARGE RESTORE TIME: 20s
